title: FOIL Method
text: The F stands for First, where we multiply the first component of each terms first. $$x x$$

title: FOIL Method
text: The O stands for Outer, where we multiply the first component of the second term with the $$\frac{second}{outer}$$ component of the second term. $$5x$$

title: FOIL Method
text: The I stands for Inner, where we multiply the inner components. $$\left(-7x\right)$$

title: FOIL Method
text: The L stands for Last, where we multiply the last component of each terms. $$\left(-7\times5\right)$$

title: Simplify
text: Simplify by combining the like terms. $$(-7x$$ and 5x)
